name: GDataXML-HTML
summary: HTML/XML parser for the iOS System, based on Google's GDataXML.
description: It implements parts of NSXML so it's easy to parse XML Files with a DOM API or XPath. This fork of the original GDataXML adds support for the HTMLparser module of libxml2 and allows you to deal with non validating XML or HTML on iOS based devices (iPhone, iPad etc).
